1801.00539 \begin{aligned}\Vert R_{\beta}-\partial_s\Vert_{C^1}&\leq C''\max\Big\{\Vert R^r_{z_*}\circ\Xi_{\mathbb A}\Vert_{C^1},\Vert R^\theta_{z_*}\circ\Xi_{\mathbb A}\Vert_{C^1},\Vert R^\phi_{z_*}\circ\Xi_{\mathbb A}-1\Vert_{C^1}\Big\}\\&\leq C''(1+\Vert {\mathrm d}\Xi_{\mathbb A}\Vert_{C^0})\Vert R_{z_*}-R_{{\mathrm{st}}}\Vert_{C^2}\\&\leq C''(1+\Vert {\mathrm d}\Xi_{\mathbb A}\Vert_{C^0})A_2C'_{\mathfrak D}\Vert \alpha-\alpha_*\Vert_{C^{2,+}},\end{aligned}

1801.00539 \begin{aligned}(i)&\ \ \text{$C^1$-smallness:}&&\max\big\{{\mathrm{dist}}_{C^1}(P,\mathrm{id}_N),\Vert \tau-1\Vert_{C^1}\big\}<\epsilon_8,\\[1ex](ii)&\ \ \text{Normalisation:}&&\tau(q)=1+\lambda_*\big(q,P(q)\big),\quad\forall\, q\in\partial N,\\[1ex](iii)&\ \ \text{Exactness:}&&P^*\lambda=\lambda+{\mathrm d}\tau,\\(iv)&\ \ \text{Volume:}&&\mathrm{Volume}(\alpha)=\int_N\tau\,{\mathrm d}\lambda,\\(v)&\ \ \text{Fixed points:}&&q\in\mathring N\ \Longrightarrow\ \Big[\,q\in\mathrm{Fix\,}(P)\ \Longleftrightarrow\ \gamma_q(t):=\Phi^\alpha_t\big(S(q)\big)\in\mathcal P_T(\alpha)\,\Big],\\[1ex](vi)&\ \ \text{Period:}&& q\in\mathring N\cap\mathrm{Fix\,}(P)\ \ \Longrightarrow\ \ T(\gamma_q)=\tau(q),\\[1ex](vii)&\ \ \text{Zoll case:}&& \text{if $\alpha$ is Zoll, then $P= \mathrm{id}_N$}.\end{aligned}
1801.00539 {\mathrm d}_{(t,q)} Q={\mathrm d}_{(t,q)}(t\,\tau)\otimes R_{\beta}(Q(t,q))+{\mathrm d}_{{\mathfrak i}_N(q)}\Phi^{\beta}_{t\, \tau(q)}\cdot{\mathrm d}_q{\mathfrak i}_N.

1801.00539 \begin{aligned}Q^*\beta=\beta_{Q}\Big({\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)\otimes R_{\beta}(Q)+{\mathrm d}_{{\mathfrak i}_N}\Phi^{\beta}_{t\,\tau}\cdot{\mathrm d}{\mathfrak i}_N\Big)&={\mathrm d}(t\,\tau) \beta(R_\beta) +(\Phi^{\beta}_{t\,\tau}\circ {\mathfrak i}_N)^*\beta\\&={\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)+{\mathfrak i}_N^*(\Phi^{\beta}_{t\,\tau})^*\beta\\&={\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)+{\mathfrak i}_N^*\beta\\&={\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)+\lambda.\end{aligned}

1801.00539 P^*\lambda=P^*{\mathfrak i}_N^*\beta=({\mathfrak i}_N\circ P)^*\beta=(Q\circ {\mathfrak i}_1)^*\beta={\mathfrak i}_1^*Q^*\beta={\mathfrak i}_1^*\big({\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)+\lambda\big)=1{\mathrm d}\tau+\lambda.

1801.00539 \begin{aligned}\mathrm{Volume}(\alpha)=\int_{N\times S^1}\beta\wedge{\mathrm d}\beta=\int_{[0,1]\times N}\big({\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)+\lambda\big)\wedge{\mathrm d}\lambda&=\int_{[0,1]\times N}{\mathrm d}(t\,\tau)\wedge{\mathrm d}\lambda\\&=\int_{[0,1]\times N}{\mathrm d}\big(t\,\tau\,{\mathrm d}\lambda\big)\\&=\int_N1\,\tau\,{\mathrm d}\lambda-\int_N0\,\tau\,{\mathrm d}\lambda,\end{aligned}

1801.00539 {\mathfrak i}_{\Delta_N}:N\hookrightarrow N\times N,\quad {\mathfrak i}_{\Delta_N}(q)=(q,q),\qquad {\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_N}:N\hookrightarrow {\mathrm T}^*N,\quad {\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_N}(q)=(q,0)
1801.00539 {\mathbb Y}':={\mathbb Y}\cap({\mathbb A}'\times{\mathbb A}'),\qquad \partial{\mathbb Y}:={\mathbb Y}\cap(\partial{\mathbb A}\times\partial{\mathbb A}).

1801.00539 \begin{aligned}{\mathcal W}_{\mathbb A}^*\lambda_{\mathrm{can}}+\lambda_{\mathbb A}\oplus(-\lambda_{\mathbb A})&=R(\theta-\Theta){\mathrm d}R+\tfrac12(R^2-r^2){\mathrm d}\theta+(-k+\tfrac12r^2){\mathrm d}\theta-(-k+\tfrac12R^2){\mathrm d}\Theta\\&=(\theta-\Theta){\mathrm d}(\tfrac12 R^2)+\tfrac12R^2{\mathrm d}(\theta-\Theta)-k{\mathrm d}(\theta-\Theta)\\&=(\theta-\Theta){\mathrm d}(-k+\tfrac12 R^2)+(-k+\tfrac12R^2){\mathrm d}(\theta-\Theta)\\&=-{\mathrm d}K_{\mathbb A}.\end{aligned}
1801.00539 g_{\mathbb A}:={\mathrm d}\rho^2+{\mathrm d}\vartheta^2,\qquad g_{{\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}}:={\mathrm d}\rho^2+{\mathrm d}\vartheta^2+{\mathrm d}p_\rho^2+{\mathrm d}p_\vartheta^2.

1801.00539 J_{{\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}}\partial_\rho=\partial_{p_\rho},\qquad J_{{\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}}\partial_\vartheta=\partial_{p_\vartheta},\qquad J_{{\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}}\partial_{p_\rho}=-\partial_{\rho},\qquad J_{{\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}}\partial_{p_\vartheta}=-\partial_{\vartheta}.

1801.00539 {\mathrm d}_q{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_{\mathbb A}}:{\mathrm T}_q{\mathbb A}\to {\mathrm T}_{(q,0)}({\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}),\qquad {\mathrm T}^*_q{\mathbb A}\to {\mathrm T}_{(q,0)}({\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}),\ \ p\mapsto p^*,
1801.00539 p^*=J_{{\mathrm T}^*{\mathbb A}}\cdot{\mathrm d}_q{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_{\mathbb A}}\cdot p^\sharp,\qquad \forall\, p\in{\mathrm T}^*_q{\mathbb A}.
1801.00539 \Upsilon:\mathcal T_{1}\to N\times N,\qquad\Upsilon(q,p):=\exp^{g}_{{\mathfrak i}_{\Delta_N}(q)}\Big(J\cdot {\mathrm d}_q {\mathfrak i}_{\Delta_N}\cdot p^\sharp\Big).
1801.00539 {\mathrm d}_{{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_N}(q)}\Upsilon\cdot u= J\cdot {\mathrm d}_q{\mathfrak i}_{\Delta_N}\cdot p^\sharp+{\mathrm d}_q{\mathfrak i}_{\Delta_N}\cdot v.

1801.00539 {\mathrm d}_{{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_{N}}(q)}K_1\cdot{\mathrm d}_{q}{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_{N}}\cdot v=0=\Lambda_{{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_N}(q)}\big({\mathrm d}_{q}{\mathfrak i}_{{\mathcal O}_{N}}\cdot v\big).
